title: Financial System Makes Big Promises on Climate Change at COP26 Summit
sub_head: The global finance industry, its regulators and investors pledge trillions in funding to reduce carbon emissions
body:
Most of the worldâ€™s big banks, its major investors and insurers, and its financial regulators have for the first time signed up to a coordinated pledge that will incorporate carbon emissions into their most fundamental decisions.
The lenders and investors say they will help fund a shift that will reduce carbon emissions by businesses and spur the growth of industries that can help limit climate change. Regulators are putting in place new rules to oversee the shift.
